name: Standard Calculator
description: Basic arithmetic operations with a clean, user-friendly interface.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-calculator size-5"><rect width="16" height="20" x="4" y="2" rx="2"></rect><line x1="8" x2="16" y1="6" y2="6"></line><line x1="16" x2="16" y1="14" y2="18"></line><path d="M16 10h.01"></path><path d="M12 10h.01"></path><path d="M8 10h.01"></path><path d="M12 14h.01"></path><path d="M8 14h.01"></path><path d="M12 18h.01"></path><path d="M8 18h.01"></path></svg>

name: Scientific Calculator
description: Advanced mathematical functions and operations for complex calculations.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-binary size-5"><rect x="14" y="14" width="4" height="6" rx="2"></rect><rect x="6" y="4" width="4" height="6" rx="2"></rect><path d="M6 20h4"></path><path d="M14 10h4"></path><path d="M6 14h2v6"></path><path d="M14 4h2v6"></path></svg>

name: Percentage Calculator
description: Calculate percentages, discounts, and percentage changes easily.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-percent size-5"><line x1="19" x2="5" y1="5" y2="19"></line><circle cx="6.5" cy="6.5" r="2.5"></circle><circle cx="17.5" cy="17.5" r="2.5"></circle></svg>

name: Fraction Calculator
description: Perform arithmetic operations with fractions and mixed numbers.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-divide size-5"><circle cx="12" cy="6" r="1"></circle><line x1="5" x2="19" y1="12" y2="12"></line><circle cx="12" cy="18" r="1"></circle></svg>

name: Geometry Calculator
description: Calculate areas, perimeters, volumes of various geometric shapes.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-triangle size-5"><path d="M13.73 4a2 2 0 0 0-3.46 0l-8 14A2 2 0 0 0 4 21h16a2 2 0 0 0 1.73-3Z"></path></svg>

name: Algebra Calculator
description: Solve equations, simplify expressions, and factor polynomials.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-variable size-5"><path d="M8 21s-4-3-4-9 4-9 4-9"></path><path d="M16 3s4 3 4 9-4 9-4 9"></path><line x1="15" x2="9" y1="9" y2="15"></line><line x1="9" x2="15" y1="9" y2="15"></line></svg>

name: GPA Calculator
description: Calculate your Grade Point Average (GPA) with weighted and unweighted options.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-graduation-cap size-5"><path d="M21.42 10.922a1 1 0 0 0-.019-1.838L12.83 5.18a2 2 0 0 0-1.66 0L2.6 9.08a1 1 0 0 0 0 1.832l8.57 3.908a2 2 0 0 0 1.66 0z"></path><path d="M22 10v6"></path><path d="M6 12.5V16a6 3 0 0 0 12 0v-3.5"></path></svg>

name: Interpolation Calculator
description: Calculate interpolated values using linear and polynomial interpolation methods for data analysis.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-trending-up size-5"><polyline points="22 7 13.5 15.5 8.5 10.5 2 17"></polyline><polyline points="16 7 22 7 22 13"></polyline></svg>

name: Statistics Calculator
description: Calculate mean, median, mode, and other statistical measures.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-chart-column-increasing size-5"><path d="M13 17V9"></path><path d="M18 17V5"></path><path d="M3 3v16a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h16"></path><path d="M8 17v-3"></path></svg>

name: Matrix Calculator
description: Perform matrix operations like addition, multiplication, and determinants.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-grid3x3 size-5"><rect width="18" height="18" x="3" y="3" rx="2"></rect><path d="M3 9h18"></path><path d="M3 15h18"></path><path d="M9 3v18"></path><path d="M15 3v18"></path></svg>

name: Probability Calculator
description: Calculate probability, combinations, permutations, and odds.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-circle-dot size-5"><circle cx="12" cy="12" r="10"></circle><circle cx="12" cy="12" r="1"></circle></svg>

name: Number Series Calculator
description: Generate and analyze arithmetic, geometric, and other sequences.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-sigma size-5"><path d="M18 7V5a1 1 0 0 0-1-1H6.5a.5.5 0 0 0-.4.8l4.5 6a2 2 0 0 1 0 2.4l-4.5 6a.5.5 0 0 0 .4.8H17a1 1 0 0 0 1-1v-2"></path></svg>

name: Prime Number Calculator
description: Check if a number is prime and find prime factors.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-hash size-5"><line x1="4" x2="20" y1="9" y2="9"></line><line x1="4" x2="20" y1="15" y2="15"></line><line x1="10" x2="8" y1="3" y2="21"></line><line x1="16" x2="14" y1="3" y2="21"></line></svg>

name: Complex Number Calculator
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-variable size-5"><path d="M8 21s-4-3-4-9 4-9 4-9"></path><path d="M16 3s4 3 4 9-4 9-4 9"></path><line x1="15" x2="9" y1="9" y2="15"></line><line x1="9" x2="15" y1="9" y2="15"></line></svg>

name: Ratio Calculator
description: Calculate and simplify ratios, find equivalent ratios.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-divide size-5"><circle cx="12" cy="6" r="1"></circle><line x1="5" x2="19" y1="12" y2="12"></line><circle cx="12" cy="18" r="1"></circle></svg>

name: Math 2D Shapes
description: Calculate area, perimeter and properties of 2D shapes like circles, triangles, rectangles.
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" class="lucide lucide-square size-5"><rect width="18" height="18" x="3" y="3" rx="2"></rect></svg>
